name: Cruise Control (itch) (chadcable)
description:
Made for the GMTK "Only One" Game Jam.

Press, slide, and flick to steer your ship to safety!

I picked several "only ones", which paradoxically made it many ones.  The genesis was one input (and one input axis), before turning into one modification per round.  I even tried to get away with using only one color, but ended up needing blue as a selection state...so close!
